newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT-TMM begun as long-term buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-TMM begun as long-term buy.

text.p: Flemings Research said on Wednesday it had started coverage of Mexican transport company Transportes Maritimos Mexicanos (TMM) with a long-term buy rating.
Analyst Terry Sigler said in a report the company is in the process of transforming itself into a regional inter-modal transportation company, a move which should translate into higher gross margins.
He said the company has also re-focused its business on Latin America.
TMM's share price is also currently trading near an all-time low, having fallen sharply after the firm took on debt to win a bid for Mexico's Northeast Railway.
But Sigler said the company should easily meet its debt obligations related to the new venture.
